org.smpp

Class SmppException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • org.smpp.SmppException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NotEnoughDataInByteBufferException, NotSynchronousException, PDUException, TerminatingZeroNotFoundException, TimeoutException, WrongSessionStateException

    public class SmppException
extends Exception
    Class SmppException is the root of all SMPP Library exceptions. Every exception defined in the library SmppException as a superclass -- this way class SmppException provides single class for catch clause.
    Version:
    $Id: SmppException.java 72 2008-07-15 19:43:00Z sverkera $
    Author:
    Logica Mobile Networks SMPP Open Source Team
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SmppException()
      Constructs a SmppException with no specified detail message.
      SmppException(Exception e)
      Constructs a SmppException with a nested exception.
      SmppException(String s)
      Constructs a SmppException with the specified detail message.
      SmppException(String s, Exception e)
      Constructs a SmppException with the specified detail message and a nested exception
